properties.name: customerId
properties.description: ID of the customer to be associated with this charge

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Amount in cents to be collected for this charge, e.g. enter 100 for $1.00

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, e.g. USD or EUR. It must be a Stripe-supported currency. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: source
properties.description: ID of the customer's payment source to be charged

options.name: description
options.description: Arbitrary text to describe the charge to create

options.name: metadata
options.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the charge to create

options.name: receipt_email
options.description: Email address to which the receipt for this charge will be sent

properties.name: eventName
properties.description: The name of the meter event. Corresponds with the event_name field on a meter.

properties.name: customerId
properties.description: The Stripe customer ID associated with this meter event

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the meter event. Must be an integer. Can be positive or negative.

options.name: identifier
options.description: A unique identifier for the event. If not provided, one will be generated. Uniqueness is enforced within a rolling 24 hour window.

options.name: timestamp
options.description: The time of the event. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch. Must be within the past 35 calendar days or up to 5 minutes in the future. Defaults to current time if not specified.

options.name: customPayload
options.description: Additional custom properties to include in the event payload. Use this for custom meter configurations with non-default payload keys.

values.name: key
values.description: The property key

values.name: value
values.description: The property value

properties.name: customerId
properties.description: ID of the customer to attach the source to

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of source (payment instrument) to create

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Amount in cents to be collected for this charge, e.g. enter 100 for $1.00

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, e.g. USD or EUR. It must be a Stripe-supported currency. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: metadata
options.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the source to create

options.name: statement_descriptor
options.description: Arbitrary text to display on the customer's statement

properties.name: customerId
properties.description: ID of the customer whose source to delete

properties.name: sourceId
properties.description: ID of the source to delete

properties.description: ID of the source to retrieve

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of token to create

properties.name: cvc
properties.description: Security code printed on the back of the card

properties.name: expirationMonth
properties.description: Number of the month when the card will expire

properties.name: expirationYear
properties.description: Year when the card will expire
